short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your frequently used text at your fingertips. Simply tap to copy instantly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Clipboard Chrome extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance your productivity by managing and storing your clipboard history. With this extension, you can easily access and retrieve previously copied items, eliminating the hassle of re-copying important information.
The user-friendly interface ensures seamless integration with your browser, and customizable settings enable you to organize and manage your clipboard history efficiently. Ideal for users who frequently work with multiple pieces of information, the Clipboard extension streamlines your workflow and boosts overall efficiency.
